title: The Nihilistic Sea Otter
description: The Nihilistic Sea Otter is a fun, philosophically minded kids' story about a Sea Otter wrestling with what gives anything meaning in a world where nothing lasts.The Nihilistic Sea Otter is the fourth story in the Animalosophy series by Eric Kesselman, and is again beautifully illustrated by Erica Missey.
author: Eric Kesselman
